name: Evil Genius - Time Machine - Lonsdale
additionalNotes:
Evil Genius Cigars takes the good/bad image an interesting step further by having black and white labels for their 2 offerings. At the 2015 IPCPR Evil Genius provided me with a sample of the Black Chapel Robusto, a 5 X 50 Maduro with filler from Nicaragua, Dominican Republic and Peru, a Dominican corojo
